name: the-invisible-users
description: Designing the Web for AI Agents and Everyone Else - Book manuscript and Web Audit Suite implementation

scripts.illustrations:generate: cd invisible-users/manuscript/illustrations && for svg in *.svg; do png="${svg%.svg}.png"; echo "Converting $svg to $png..."; magick convert -density 300 -background white -alpha remove -alpha off -depth 8 "$svg" "$png" 2>/dev/null || convert -density 300 -background white -alpha remove -alpha off -depth 8 "$svg" "$png"; done && echo "✓ All PNG illustrations generated (8-bit RGB)"
scripts.pdf:html: pandoc invisible-users/manuscript/executive-summary.md invisible-users/manuscript/preface.md invisible-users/manuscript/chapter-*.md invisible-users/manuscript/Glossary.md invisible-users/manuscript/The-End.md -o the-invisible-users.html --resource-path=invisible-users/manuscript --standalone --toc --toc-depth=2 --metadata title='The Invisible Users' --metadata subtitle='Designing the Web for AI Agents and Everyone Else' --metadata author='Tom Cranstoun' --metadata date='January 2026' && echo '✓ HTML generated: the-invisible-users.html (open and print to PDF using ⌘+P)'
scripts.pdf:generate: pandoc invisible-users/manuscript/metadata.yaml invisible-users/manuscript/executive-summary.md invisible-users/manuscript/preface.md invisible-users/manuscript/chapter-*.md invisible-users/manuscript/Glossary.md invisible-users/manuscript/The-End.md -o the-invisible-users.pdf --resource-path=invisible-users/manuscript --pdf-engine=xelatex --listings --toc --toc-depth=2 -V geometry:margin=1in -V fontsize=11pt -V documentclass=book -V papersize=a4 -V linkcolor=blue && echo '✓ PDF generated: the-invisible-users.pdf'
scripts.pdf:kindle: pandoc invisible-users/manuscript/metadata-kindle.yaml invisible-users/manuscript/executive-summary.md invisible-users/manuscript/preface.md invisible-users/manuscript/chapter-*.md invisible-users/manuscript/Glossary.md invisible-users/manuscript/The-End.md -o the-invisible-users-kindle.pdf --resource-path=invisible-users/manuscript --pdf-engine=xelatex --listings --toc --toc-depth=2 -V geometry:paperwidth=6in -V geometry:paperheight=9in -V geometry:inner=0.625in -V geometry:outer=0.5in -V geometry:top=0.625in -V geometry:bottom=0.625in -V fontsize=11pt -V documentclass=book -V classoption=openright -V linkcolor=black && echo '✓ Kindle PDF generated: the-invisible-users-kindle.pdf'
scripts.pdf:simple: pandoc invisible-users/manuscript/executive-summary.md invisible-users/manuscript/preface.md invisible-users/manuscript/chapter-*.md invisible-users/manuscript/Glossary.md invisible-users/manuscript/The-End.md -o the-invisible-users-simple.pdf --resource-path=invisible-users/manuscript --pdf-engine=xelatex --toc --toc-depth=2 -V geometry:margin=1in -V fontsize=11pt -V linkcolor=blue --metadata title='The Invisible Users' --metadata subtitle='Designing the Web for AI Agents and Everyone Else' --metadata author='Tom Cranstoun' --metadata date='January 2026' && echo '✓ Simple PDF generated: the-invisible-users-simple.pdf'
scripts.pdf:all: npm run illustrations:generate && npm run pdf:html && npm run pdf:kindle && npm run pdf:generate && npm run pdf:appendix

author: Tom Cranstoun
